meanings.definition: A series of episodes released on the internet.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching webisodes on my computer.
meanings.sent2: The webisodes of that show are always entertaining.
meanings.sent3: The webisodes about cats made me laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a series of webisodes, each chapter unfolding online.
meanings.sent5: The webisodes featuring cooking tips were incredibly helpful.

meanings.definition: Short video episodes created for online viewing.
meanings.sent1: Webisodes are perfect for watching during short breaks.
meanings.sent2: She produced webisodes showcasing her artistic talents.
meanings.sent3: The webisodes about aliens were out of this world!
meanings.sent4: His creativity knew no bounds when it came to crafting webisodes.
meanings.sent5: The webisodes captured the essence of daily life in a unique way.
